title: Get max delivery or creative boost sessions within a campaign

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Product GMV Max Campaign. To create a Product GMV Max Campaign and obtain the campaign ID, use /campaign/gmv_max/create/ and set shopping_ads_type to PRODUCT . To filter existing Product GMV Max Campaigns within your ad account, use /gmv_max/campaign/get/ and set filtering to {"gmv_max_promotion_types":["PRODUCT_GMV_MAX"]} .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: session_list
fields.description: The list of max delivery sessions for products or creative boost sessions for videos within the Product GMV Max Campaign.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: The ID of the Product GMV Max Campaign.

fields.name: bid_type
fields.description: Session type. Enum values: NO_BID : max delivery session. CREATIVE_NO_BID : creative boost session.

fields.name: session_id
fields.description: The ID of the max delivery session for the product or creative boost session for the video in the Product GMV Max Campaign. When bid_type is NO_BID , this field represents the ID of a max delivery session. When bid_type is CREATIVE_NO_BID , this field represents the ID of a creative boost session.

fields.name: budget
fields.description: The daily max delivery budget or daily creative boost budget. Max delivery uses additional budget, separate from target ROI optimization budget, paced for more predictable ad spending. Your target ROI budget wonâ€™t be used for products using max delivery while max delivery is active. Creative Boost is a functionality within Product GMV Max that allows sellers to manually promote specific videos by allocating extra daily budget.

fields.name: spu_id
fields.description: The Product SPU (standard product unit) ID.

fields.name: schedule_type
fields.description: Schedule type for max delivery or creative boost. Enum values: SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW : To enable the max delivery or creative boost mode for the product continuously after the schedule_start_time , until the campaign scheduled end time. SCHEDULE_START_END : To enable the max delivery or creative boost mode for the product between the schedule_start_time and schedule_end_time .

fields.name: schedule_start_time
fields.description: The start time for the max delivery or creative boost mode, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0).

fields.name: schedule_end_time
fields.description: The end time for the max delivery or creative boost mode, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0).
